title: Microsoft Toolkit 2.6 Beta 2 Windows/Office Activator {B4tman}
description:
Microsoft Toolkit 2.6 Beta 2 (Windows & Office Activator) {B4tman}
 
http://s29.postimg.org/ut2sx8mvr/Microsoft_Toolkit_png_resize_210_274.png 
http://s2.postimg.org/5pn45knp5/image.png

Description:-

Microsoft Toolkit is a set of tools and functions for managing licensing, deploying, and activating Microsoft Office and Windows. All output from these functions is displayed in the Information Console. All functions are run in the background and the GUI is disabled to prevent running multiple functions, as they could conflict or cause damage if run concurrently. The Microsoft Office Setup Customization Functions (Customize Setup Tab), AutoKMS Uninstaller (if AutoKMS is installed), AutoRearm Uninstaller (if AutoRearm is installed), Office Uninstaller and Product Key Checker work even if Microsoft Office or Windows is not installed/supported.

Requirements:-

â€¢ Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0-4.6 (Not 3.5)
â€¢ Microsoft Office 2010 or Later for Office Toolkit Support
â€¢ Windows Vista or Later for Windows Toolkit Support

Whats New in 2.6 Beta 2:-

â€¢ Office 2016 Click To Run Partial Support (If Converted to VL).
â€¢ Office 2016 Traditional Full Support.
â€¢ Fixed removing of Trial/Grace Product Keys via EZ-Activator.
â€¢ License Backup will no longer save Registration.reg files.
â€¢ Main Office Tab will indicate Traditional vs Click To Run Office install type.
â€¢ Office Uninstaller removes Office 2016 and Click To Run, as well as Office 365 editions.
â€¢ Updated Task Scheduler Library
